person_say: I’ve been really stressed lately, the exam is coming up, and I can’t focus on studying. Is there a quick way to relax?
animal_say: It sounds tough! Bruno, the bear, specializes in relaxation techniques. Want to meet him for some calming tips?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to get some calming tips from him.
animal_say: Great choice! Bruno will help you find some peace and calm. Let’s go see him!
